title: Contact Us
heading: Let's Create Something Beautiful Together
formHeading: TELL US ABOUT YOUR INTERIOR DESIGN PROJECT

details: Phone consultation to discuss your project
In-home/off-site consultation to assess your needs and determine project scope
Design proposal outlining project scope and fee
Measure space and create floor plans
Develop a unique design plan perfect for your space
Present concept boards, schematic designs, and estimated cost
Make necessary changes and finalize the design plan
Assist with selecting the right contractor
Work closely with contractors to oversee the progress
Coordinate delivery and installation of furnishings and accessories

cta.text: Ready to get started? Contact Nu Curations today to schedule your consultation.
